title: AD ZHONYAS
body: Not much to say. we need an AD zhonyas. c'mon rito its about time{{item:3157}}

replies.body: We should wait up and see where that assassin rework takes us. If ADCs start to encounter issues again though, it might not be a bad idea to consider reworking it into a summoner spell IMO.
the "cleanse" summoner spell you remove all debuffs, or you know, bring back the only real counterplay to assassins as and adc, the old merc scim.
